room_title: Escape room "Molly’s Horror Room" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
room_description:
Molly loved songs, and dolls, and teddy bears just like any other girl. Then two years ago, little Molly disappeared…Her room looks exactly as she left it, untouched (by the living). Lately, Molly’s parents have noticed strange and frightful disturbances.
You and your team are from the Department of Paranormal Investigations, and you’ve been invited to investigate Molly’s room. Unfortunately, you, too, will have to be locked-in. Will you uncover the secret of missing Molly?
This cold-case will be hard to crack, and night-lights won’t keep these ghosts at bay. Can you handle the horror?
